data.name: Godshard Chronicles
data.detailed_description:
Godshard Chronicles is a top-down action RPG based in the world of the Godshard series of novels. Inspired by titles such as The Legend of Zelda, Grandia, and the Mana series, exciting action combat combines together with meaningful storyline choices and a beautiful musical score!

Join Adanna and Ruby as the pair progress through the ranks of Mana Knights and chase down Adanna's lost father while discovering the mysteries behind the titular Godshard. Adventure in the world solo, or bring along a friend in local co-op!

KEY FEATURES:
  • HIGH-QUALITY PIXEL ART
    A sprawling beautiful fantasy world with a 16-bit/32-bit touch.

  • FAST & SIMPLE GAMEPLAY
    No extended tutorials necessary. Easy-to-learn controls makes the gameplay accessible for anyone.

  • LOCAL CO-OP
    Play with a friend in local couch co-op mode!

  • MELODIC SOUNDTRACK
    Noriyuki Iwadare, composer of the Lunar and Grandia series, lends his talents along with violinist/composer Shauno Isomura to produce a stunning, melodic soundtrack.

  • VOICED-CHARACTERS
    Hear the talented cast bring our characters to life during story-rich cutscenes.

data.short_description: Godshard Chronicles is a top-down action RPG based in the world of the Godshard novels with music by famed composer Noriyuki Iwadare. Inspired by titles such as The Legend of Zelda, Grandia, and the Mana series. Fight in action-packed battles, explore a sprawling world either solo or with a friend!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Later
  • Processor: AMD E-350 or Intel i3 3220
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6310
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
